returnPolicy.title: What is your return policy?
returnPolicy.body: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging.

shippingTime.title: How long does shipping take?
shippingTime.body: Shipping typically takes 3-5 business days for domestic orders and 7-14 days for international orders.

internationalShipping.title: Do you offer international shipping?
internationalShipping.body: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times may vary depending on the destination.

createAccount.title: How to create an account?
createAccount.body: You can create an account by clicking the signup button on the top right corner of the page and entering your Name, email and password. After that, you will receive a verification email to verify your account. Click the link in the email to verify your account and you will be redirected to the Home page.

login.title: How to login to the website?
login.body: You can login to the website by clicking the login button on the top right corner of the page and entering your email and password.

resetPassword.title: How to reset my password?
resetPassword.body: You can reset your password by clicking the reset password button on the login page and entering your email. You will receive a reset password email. Click the link in the email to go to the reset password page and enter your new password. Then you can login to the website with your new password.
